name: Sanskar India Foundation
briefDescription: Sanskar India Foundation (SIF) is a registered not-for-profit organization working in the field of civic, social and environmental awareness as well as education, mainly in Mumbai, for the past eleven years.SIF aims to create a class of independent and responsible citizens who are not just sensitive to environmental, social and health concerns but are also committed toward inclusive development for a better tomorrow.SIF’s flagship program, ‘Sanskar’, has been conceptualized with the intention of empowering future citizens to do their bit for the environment. Sanskar has been designed as a full-fledged subject with a practical edge that allows children to realize problems and develop practical solutions to them.
